message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $100 to you, and I believe it's also a great opportunity for you to enhance your experience. I'm offering it to you for $85. Let me know if this works for you!

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you being flexible. While I'm interested, $85 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $75?  I'm confident this product will be worth it for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I appreciate your confidence in the product. I am willing to meet you halfway at $80 for the product. This is my best offer, considering its value to you and the market conditions.
